original_text: I am confident in the Lord that you will take no other view. The one who is throwing you into confusion, whoever that may be, will have to pay the penalty.
korean_text: 나는 너희가 아무 다른 마음을 품지 아니할 줄을 주 안에서 확신하노라 그러나 너희를 요동하게 하는 자는 누구든지 심판을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: I am confident in the Lord
that you will take no other view
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 다른 견해를 가지지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The one who is throwing you into confusion
will have to pay the penalty
